scripts.android-dev: cross-env QENV=local quasar dev -m cordova -T android
scripts.android-dev-server: cross-env QENV=development quasar dev -m cordova -T android
scripts.android-prod-server: cross-env QENV=production quasar dev -m cordova -T android
scripts.android-build: cross-env QENV=production quasar build -m cordova -T android -- -- --packageType=apk
scripts.android-build-server: cross-env QENV=production quasar dev -m cordova -T android
scripts.android-dev-build: cross-env QENV=development quasar build -m cordova -T android -- -- --packageType=apk
scripts.android-local-build: cross-env QENV=local quasar build -m cordova -T android -- -- --packageType=apk
scripts.android-build-aab: cross-env QENV=production quasar build -m cordova -T android -- -- --packageType=bundle
